author: May Bulman, May Bulman
title: Coronavirus: Home Office to extend visas of foreign nationals unable to return home due to pandemic
description: Announcement comes amid concerns people being told to leave UK despite travel bans
content:
The Home Office has announced it will extend the visas of people unable to return to their home countries due to the coronavirus outbreak.
Foreign nationals whose UK visas expire anytime after 24 January and who cannot leave the country because of travel ban… [+1665 chars]
